abilities.name: Parasitic Infection
abilities.rule: Each time an **INFANTRY** model is destroyed by an attack made with this model’s barbed ovipositor, after this model has finished making its attacks, you can add one new **RIPPER SWARMS** unit to your army consisting of D3 models and set it up within 3" of this model. If you do, that **RIPPER SWARMS** unit can be set up within Engagement Range of the destroyed model’s unit (but not within Engagement Range of any other enemy units).

abilities.name: It Itches!
abilities.rule: At the start of the Fight phase, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.
